page.title: 18LIKES AND DISLIKES - PART 2
page.content: One of the things I hate doing is picking the leaves off our lawn and washing the pots for my dad. Another thing I hate doing best is emptying the airing cupboard for my mum. The food I don't like is potatoes and potato hash and sausages. Another thing that I don't like is when my mum doesn't give me any pocket money because I dont empty my bag, and don't take my shoes off. We have to because we have a new rug in our lounge. Another thing I don't like is when my mum and dad go out to restaurants and I have to stay in bed having a horrible time trying to get to sleep while my mum and dad are having a lovely time eating. Another thing I hate doing is having to wear my blouses because I dont like blouses.
